<script type="text/javascript">
					function playMusic() {
						var audioElement = $("<audio>");
					    audioElement.attr({
					        'src'	   : 'view/voice/cash.ogg',
					        'autoplay' : 'autoplay',
					    });
					}

					setInterval(function(){
						$.get("index.php?route=sale/order/getTotalForNotification&user_token={{ user_token }}", function(data, status){
							if (data == 'true') {
								playMusic();				
							}
					  	});
					}, 10000);
				</script>
